thread.title: The Era of Cheap Fund Fees Marches On

author: Sarah Krouse
title: The Era of Cheap Fund Fees Marches On
text:
It has never been cheaper to invest in stock and bond funds.
The asset-weighted average fee for U.S. mutual and exchange-traded funds fell 8% to 0.52% in 2017, Morningstar Inc. said Thursday.
Despite a steady decline in fund fees for more than a decade, this past yearâ€™s decline is the largest year-over-year fall since at least 2000.
